Package ohos.agp.components.webengine

Interface WebConfig


  • public interface WebConfig
    Manages the configuration status of the WebView object.
    Since:
    5

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int SECURITY_ALLOW
      Indicates that the WebView will allow a secure source to load content from other sources even from an insecure source.
      static int SECURITY_NOT_ALLOW
      Indicates that the WebView will not allow a secure source to load content from an insecure source.
      static int SECURITY_SELF_ADAPTIVE
      Indicates that the WebView will adopt an adaptive mode to load content from an insecure source.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int getSecurityMode​()
      Obtains the security mode in which the WebView loads resources.
      String getUserAgent​()
      Obtains the current UserAgent.
      boolean isDataAbilityPermitted​()
      Checks whether access to the Data ability is allowed in the WebView.
      boolean isJavaScriptPermitted​()
      Checks whether JavaScript execution is enabled.
      boolean isLoadsImagesPermitted​()
      Checks whether the WebView is allowed to load image resources.
      boolean isMediaAutoReplay​()
      Checks whether the WebView automatically plays the media file on the current page.
      boolean isTextAutoSizing​()
      Checks whether auto text sizing is enabled.
      boolean isViewPortFitScreen​()
      Checks whether the viewport fits the screen width.
      boolean isWebStoragePermitted​()
      Checks whether web storage (also known as HTML5 DOM storage) is enabled.
      void setDataAbilityPermit​(boolean isPermitted)
      Sets whether to allow the access to the Data ability in the WebView.
      void setJavaScriptPermit​(boolean isPermitted)
      Sets whether to enable JavaScript in the WebView.
      void setLoadsImagesPermit​(boolean isPermitted)
      Sets whether to allow the WebView to load image resources.
      void setLocationPermit​(boolean isPermitted)
      Sets whether to enable locating for the WebView.
      void setMediaAutoReplay​(boolean isPermitted)
      Sets whether to enable the WebView to automatically play the media file on the current page when the page is opened.
      void setSecurityMode​(int securityMode)
      Sets the security policy for the WebView to load resources.
      void setTextAutoSizing​(boolean isTextAutoSizing)
      Sets whether to enable auto text sizing.
      void setUserAgent​(String userAgent)
      Sets the UserAgent, which will use the default value if the input string is null or empty.
      void setViewPortFitScreen​(boolean isFitScreen)
      Sets whether the viewport fits the screen width.
      void setWebStoragePermit​(boolean isPermitted)
      Sets whether to enable HTML5 DOM storage.

    • Field Detail

      • SECURITY_ALLOW

        static final int SECURITY_ALLOW
        Indicates that the WebView will allow a secure source to load content from other sources even from an insecure source.

        This constant is used by setSecurityMode(int).

        Since:
        5
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SECURITY_NOT_ALLOW

        static final int SECURITY_NOT_ALLOW
        Indicates that the WebView will not allow a secure source to load content from an insecure source.

        This constant is used by setSecurityMode(int).

        Since:
        5
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SECURITY_SELF_ADAPTIVE

        static final int SECURITY_SELF_ADAPTIVE
        Indicates that the WebView will adopt an adaptive mode to load content from an insecure source.

        This constant is used by setSecurityMode(int).

        Since:
        5
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • setDataAbilityPermit

        void setDataAbilityPermit​(boolean isPermitted)
        Sets whether to allow the access to the Data ability in the WebView.

        If the access is allowed, the WebView will be able to load content from the Data ability installed in the system.

        Parameters:
        isPermitted - Specifies whether the access is allowed. The default value is true.
        Since:
        5

      • setJavaScriptPermit

        void setJavaScriptPermit​(boolean isPermitted)
        Sets whether to enable JavaScript in the WebView.
        Parameters:
        isPermitted - Specifies whether JavaScript is enabled. The default value is false.
        Since:
        5

      • setWebStoragePermit

        void setWebStoragePermit​(boolean isPermitted)
        Sets whether to enable HTML5 DOM storage.
        Parameters:
        isPermitted - Specifies whether HTML5 DOM storage is enabled. The default value is false.
        Since:
        5

      • setLocationPermit

        void setLocationPermit​(boolean isPermitted)
        Sets whether to enable locating for the WebView.
        Parameters:
        isPermitted - Specifies whether locating is enabled. The default value is true.
        Since:
        5

      • setLoadsImagesPermit

        void setLoadsImagesPermit​(boolean isPermitted)
        Sets whether to allow the WebView to load image resources.
        Parameters:
        isPermitted - Specifies whether image resource loading is allowed. The default value is true.
        Since:
        5

      • setMediaAutoReplay

        void setMediaAutoReplay​(boolean isPermitted)
        Sets whether to enable the WebView to automatically play the media file on the current page when the page is opened.
        Parameters:
        isPermitted - Specifies whether media playback is enabled. The default value is false.
        Since:
        5

      • setSecurityMode

        void setSecurityMode​(int securityMode)
        Sets the security policy for the WebView to load resources.
        Parameters:
        securityMode - Indicates the security mode to use, which can be WebConfig#SECURITY_ALLOW, WebConfig#SECURITY_NOT_ALLOW, or WebConfig#SECURITY_SELF_ADAPTIVE.
        Since:
        5

      • isDataAbilityPermitted

        boolean isDataAbilityPermitted​()
        Checks whether access to the Data ability is allowed in the WebView.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the access is allowed; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        5

      • isJavaScriptPermitted

        boolean isJavaScriptPermitted​()
        Checks whether JavaScript execution is enabled.
        Returns:
        Returns true if JavaScript execution is enabled; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        5

      • isWebStoragePermitted

        boolean isWebStoragePermitted​()
        Checks whether web storage (also known as HTML5 DOM storage) is enabled.
        Returns:
        Returns true if web storage is enabled; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        5

      • isLoadsImagesPermitted

        boolean isLoadsImagesPermitted​()
        Checks whether the WebView is allowed to load image resources.
        Returns:
        Returns true if loading image resources is allowed; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        5

      • isMediaAutoReplay

        boolean isMediaAutoReplay​()
        Checks whether the WebView automatically plays the media file on the current page.
        Returns:
        Returns true if automatic media playback is enabled; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        5

      • getSecurityMode

        int getSecurityMode​()
        Obtains the security mode in which the WebView loads resources. The security mode can be SECURITY_ALLOW, SECURITY_NOT_ALLOW, or SECURITY_SELF_ADAPTIVE.
        Returns:
        Returns the security mode in use.
        Since:
        5
        See Also:
        setSecurityMode(int)

      • setViewPortFitScreen

        void setViewPortFitScreen​(boolean isFitScreen)
        Sets whether the viewport fits the screen width.
        Parameters:
        isFitScreen - Specifies whether the viewport fits the screen width. The default value is true, in which case the viewport fits the screen width.
        Since:
        5

      • isViewPortFitScreen

        boolean isViewPortFitScreen​()
        Checks whether the viewport fits the screen width.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the viewport fits the screen width; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        5

      • setTextAutoSizing

        void setTextAutoSizing​(boolean isTextAutoSizing)
        Sets whether to enable auto text sizing.
        Parameters:
        isTextAutoSizing - Specifies whether to enable auto text sizing. true indicates auto text sizing is enabled, and false (default value) indicates the opposite case.
        Since:
        5

      • isTextAutoSizing

        boolean isTextAutoSizing​()
        Checks whether auto text sizing is enabled.
        Returns:
        Returns true if auto text sizing is enabled; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        5

      • setUserAgent

        void setUserAgent​(String userAgent)
        Sets the UserAgent, which will use the default value if the input string is null or empty.
        Parameters:
        userAgent - Indicates the UserAgent to set. This parameter can be null.
        Since:
        5

      • getUserAgent

        String getUserAgent​()
        Obtains the current UserAgent.
        Returns:
        Returns the current UserAgent.
        Since:
        5
